mods.note: FOR OFFICIAL USE ONLY. Sadanawiyah Creek leading to the 6hatt>-a/'Hai BATTLE of NASI RlYAH ring the point reached by our Infantry on the ight 24th, 25th July 1915. Looking North. GENERAL STAFF INDIA.FOR OFFICIAL USE ONLY. BATTLE of NASIR1YAH Shewing the point reached by our Infantry on the night 24th, 25th July 1915. Looking North. S. D. 0. No. 1361 September, 1915. GENERAL STAFF INDIA.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: Imprint:General Staff India.Distinctive Features:View of battle of Nasiriyah produced to illustrate 'Report from Gen Sir John Eccles Nixon’ showing the point reached by the British Infantry on the night 24-25th July 1915 with landmarks labelled for reference.Marked ‘For Official Use Only’.In the left-hand corner: ‘S.D.O. No. 1351, September, 1915’.
